titles.title: REMOTE Act
REMOTE Act
Requiring Effective Management and Oversight of Teleworking Employees Act
A bill to require each Executive department to establish policies and collect information regarding teleworking employees of the Executive department, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
